ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So do not obey those who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So do not comply with those who deny:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do not, then, yield to those who reject the Truth, decrying it as false;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not yield to those who reject the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore do not listen to the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, do not obey the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So do not yield to the rejecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So obey thou not those who cry lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor obey not thou the rejecters
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not give in to the deniers of truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore obey not thou the beliers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not obey the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So hearken not to those who deny (the Truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So (O Muhammad SAW) obey not the deniers [(of Islamic Monotheism those who belie the Verses of Allah), the Oneness of Allah, and the Messenger of Allah (Muhammad SAW), etc.]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, do not obey those who belie,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So do not obey the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then do not obey the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:8] So do not obey the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore obey not thou) Muhammad (the rejecters) the disbelievers in Allah, His Scripture and His Messenger, i.e. the leaders of the people of Mecca
